title: [Large-Scale] Integrated Competency Development Course Based on Financial Statement Analysis Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Accounting Principles, Understanding of Financial Statement Components, and Proficiency in Basic Excel Functions
context.additional_context: As Practicing Professionals with Experience in Real-World Data Analysis, Project Outcomes Are Structured to Be Applicable to Actual Work Environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze selected corporate financial statements to calculate and interpret 15 key financial ratios
Learners can write a 10-page research report based on analysis results while adhering to APA academic formatting standards
Learners can experience feedback provision/acceptance processes through peer review and perform at least two report revisions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
